column1: Waterland (pronunciation ) is a municipality in the Netherlands
column2: located in the province of North Holland. It is situated north of Amsterdam
column3: on the western shore of the Markermeer. It is well-known for comprising the touristy towns of Broek in Waterland and Marken.
